May 29, 1965 D Scottish Championship (Fourth Section)
Scottish Championship (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final)
Scotland
Fourth
Sinfonietta Pastorale
Reid Hall, Forfar, Angus, Scotland, UK 6 bands played.
In this year a separate Scottish Area Qualifying contest was held, in the usual February slot in Edinburgh; this separated Scottish Championship contest moved to May.
